title: Detective versus Detectives
resume: Kitagawa Keiko plays Sasaki Rena, a detective who risks  her life investigating detectives for her dead sister. Beautiful,  intelligent, and with a great memory, the talented woman judges  situations and chooses the most appropriate course of action. Her brutal  past surrounding her sister's death inspires her to learn everything  she can about detectives, leading her to visit the Suma Research  Company. As the sole member of the Anti-Detective Department responsible  for investigating and pursuing unethical detectives, she is a solitary  lady detective.
